p: Recently, there has been a continuous increase in DENV outbreaks worldwide due to global warming, increased global travel, and rapid urbanization [ 3, 4]. DENV infections have been increasingly identified in Korean travelers returning from dengue-endemic countries [ 15, 16]. However, information about DENV isolates from Korea has been limited. In this report, we present a molecular and evolutionary analysis of DENV type 2 strains isolated from Korean overseas travelers.
